Name: Pizza Classica
AttributesDescription: Increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 40% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription:
A traditional dish from Rinascita, topped with gemberry jam, cheese, and smoked sausage. When it comes out of the oven, it fills the air with a rich aroma.
There was a man who swore he'd never have olives on his pizza, but the more he resisted, the more olives he got.
ObtainedShowDescription: Increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 40% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
